attributes.review: This app is horrifying; i opened it and saw a disgusting orange creature, yeah scarier than the word scary itself. I now need to wear glasses to help me see because i am now blind and like many others; i need therapy, 15 times a day and 105 times a week. This will scar you til the day you die and i hope we dont have this scary ugly lookin stuff around for a looongg time.
attributes.title: Scarred for Life

attributes.review: i opened the app and it forced me to take a video of me eating orange cheetos even tho i’m allergic and if i didn’t that they would leak all my info, i threw up later that day. It then forced me to smack my little brother with a bag of cheetos i don’t know what this app has with cheetos but it’s very disturbing 0/10 i do not recommend the app, it’s very very very toxic
attributes.title: ahhh no ❤️

attributes.review: Please open the end are you sick of pictures of six president in the head or you information like that do you what is burning flags and we are there cares about Black Lives Matter just like you do you have my real name is My  information it’s much better every year in such a bad person
attributes.title: Bad app 🤮🤮🤢

attributes.review: This app just is awful, no functionality and on top of that just unreliable. Freedom of speech is allowed but some of the crude foul speech that comes with this app is astonishing. And on top of that I can’t believe the Apple team would allow such a terrible image and message to be spread through their store.
attributes.title: Stop before you download

attributes.review: all of the things that could possibly be wrong with the app is in the app! i guess the app didn’t like my latinx last name so they didn’t even let me enter until i faked being caucasian. gross, disgusting, racist! i want to speak to the manager of this app. my doctor also told me i have ptsd and am legally blind because of the opening picture in the app. how can they scar people’s eyes like that! the nerve of these people. this app should be deleted and if it isn’t i will call corporate and get everyone involved in this nasty operation fired. karens matter. delete it apple!!
attributes.title: terrible terrible terrible

attributes.review: Omg so storytime✨✨💕💞. Got this app to support the big orange carrot gentleman 🤩🤩🤩😁😁🥕🥕🥕🥕🥕🍊🍊but here’s what happened. I went to create an account and it blocked me from doing 💋anything💋. So I said you know what-no❤️. So I made an account again and it finally let me in, through all the ☀️struggles☀️, and I found out what the trump administration IS REALLY LIKE😱😱😱and you do not want to know😤😤.
attributes.title: ✨🧚‍♂️YIKES🧚‍♂️✨

attributes.review: So I showed my pet guinea pig this app and he immediately started projectile vomiting on my screen then my dog started barking and going CRAZY then my bird starting flying everywhere freaking out and pooping on my freshly cleaned couches while the tv was malfunctioning it was just HORRIBLE! Would never recommend this to any of my friends or family. Disgusting. 🤢😒
attributes.title: This ain’t it.

attributes.review: I got this app to learn about when the rallies were. But when I opened it I saw the most disgusting picture of this gross carrot molding and looking all nasty on the page. I was horrified how could such an app shows such disgusting and disturbing images. Don’t even get me started on the Chito’s that were on the page gross!
attributes.title: Horrid and scary pictures!

attributes.review: As I opened the app, I cried “the horror, the horror!”, as the image of Donald Trump’s mushroom penis popped up. I tried relentlessly to close it, but every time I pushed the close button two more appeared- until my screen was half way filled with a 100 of his tiny wieners (life size of course). It is a disgrace that this pornographic app is not age restricted and anyone download it to see Mr. Donnie’s peepee. Disgrace I SAY! DISGRACE!
attributes.title: The Horror

attributes.review: Someone suggested this app to me on tiktok so I downloaded it and when I opened the app all I saw was a Cheeto last time I checked the app was not the gas station. I think this app should be removed from the App Store or even banned in just like tiktok (the best app in the world) was banned in the USA. Plus only Karen’s use this app so what’s the point? TIKTOK LIVES MATTER ✊✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿
attributes.title: This app is not it🤢
